name: What the Firetruck
description:
Play as a fire truck in a fire mayhem! You have 2 minutes to keep the city alive and prevent as many people from dying as possible. Put out fires, send people to rescue helicopters, and avoid car accidents to prevent the fire from spreading…

CONTROLS

  • Move - WASD
  • Shoot Water - Arrow Keys
  • Dual-stick controller supported!

TIPS

  • You need to refill water every now and then! Just move next to a fire hydrant
  • People need to be rescued - touch them to pick them up, then move under the helicopter to send them to safety
  • Your truck moves slower when carrying more people
  • Sometimes, car drivers will not be nice!

Made for Ludum Dare 46 - "Keep It Alive" (page link)

By @dvdfu and Hamdan Javeed
